name: Misty Forest
description:
Introduction

Made for the GMTK GameJam 2022 Misty Forest is a Game of Chance. Beating up Enemies does not deal Damage but rather fills your Dicometer. Roll the Dice to unlock Weapons and Magic to defeat your enemies and reach the end of the Game.

How to play

Beat up Enemies to fill your Dicometer (The blue Bar under your Dice Tray). Hit Enemies to fill your Dicometer and level it up. When pressing "Q" you roll the Dice. The highest number you can roll is based on the Level of your Dicometer. After rolling your Dice you can unlock a Weapon for a Short Time. Now go and defeat your Enemies!

BUG: When rolling a 1 you have to restart (Die) because you cannot unlock a Weapon nor reroll.

Information

This game was made by two people in 48 hours.

While all of the Background Assets were premade, Characters, Enemies and Animations were made by us.
